metadata.title: CVE-2021-47116 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ext4:fix memory leak in ext4_mb_init_backend on error path. Fix a memory leakdiscovered by syzbot when a file system is corrupted with an illegallylarge s_log_groups_per_flex.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
